alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 11:39AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SAN MIGUEL AND CENTRAL HARDING COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM MDT... At 1139 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mosquero, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mosquero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County
